title: The Last unicorn [DVD]
creator_credit: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jnr, Bass in association with ITC Films and Rankin-Bass Productions
brief_description: This classic fairy tale for audiences of all ages tells the story of a beautiful unicorn who leaves her home in the lilac woods in the hope of finding another unicorn somewhere in the world. Escorted by Schmendrick, an inept wizard, she tries to find King Haggard’s castle where the evil red bull lives. The distinguished cast of voices includes Mia Farrow, Alan Arkin, Jeff Bridges, Angela Lansbury, Tammy Grimes, Christopher Lee and Keenan Wynn. Based on the novel by Peter S. Beagle.
